de.alombra.dine.steps.execution.instruction
Interface InstructionRunner<T extends Instruction>

Type Parameters:
T -
All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractInstructionRunner, DownloadRunner, StepRunner
public interface InstructionRunner<T extends Instruction>
extends java.lang.Runnable

Base interfaces for all classes that can run/execute instructions ( e.g. steps, downloads )

Author:
ssc
